casebody.data:
JEREMIAH J. COLMAN et al., Plaintiffs and Respondents, v. ISAAC DIXON, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Appeal from an order denying motion of defendant to have the issues of fact tried by a jury. Arnoux, Ritch & Woodford, for appellant. Andrew Boardman, for respondents. Order affirmed.

No opinion delivered.
